OUR
Mission

Provide distributed flexible infrastructure and corresponding unified service to rollout various computational units from micro-servers up to powerful miners and full fledged servers for the global level competitive costs

Make most powerful cloud-computing network to support perspective decentralized technologies for web 3.0

Create DAO (Decentralized Autonomous Organization) to break limits of growth and expand unified nanohub-based services worldwide

Infrastructure

В этом разделе можно написать о том, что компания Wattom предоставляет два варианта (форм-фактора) размещения оборудования: полки и рельсы. Также можно указать их фундаментальные отличия и/или случаи для которых больше подходит каждый из вариантов.

Помимо этого можно указать, что процесс выбора осуществляется при помощи пошагового визарда

Площадки

Описать по каким принципам формируются контейнеры на площадках. Какие площадки уже имеются, а какие рассматриваются в качестве потенциальных. На какие данные следует обратить внимание.

Each nanohub has duplication of every system: internet connectivity, power control units, sensors (temperature, heat zones and inflammation areas), CO2-based fire extinguishing, surveillance.

Нанохабы

Здесь стоит коротко написать об особенностях выбора и оплаты нанохабов. Что принцип выбора похож на выбор и бронирование места в кинотеатре.

Wattom time-to-time preparing and releases future nanohub projects (facilities) and allowing users to buy (or reserve) future slot or slots.

Wattom is the tokenized company and there are 2 types of tokens exists:

Slot token

Subtyped to “power shelf slot” for non-standard (for example mining) equipment and “1U/2U rack shelf” for 1 or 2 units server cases

Power token

Сonvertible electricity in kW*h

To get hosted user needs to buy Slot token from the Wattom or on the secondary market

  • Each Slot token gives the right to place selected\existing\new equipment into corresponding slot in the corresponding anohub.
  • Each Slot token is emitted as a Non Fungible Token (NFT) and contains limited amount of Power tokens locked within (this amount will be used to cover future fees).
  • Each Power token is the regular divisible token and represents kW*h - power consumption - and used as means of fee compensation for the service provided; once Power token or its any part is utilized (used in the transaction to pay for the service), this part is irreversibly burned.
  • Power token can be bought in the open market to guarantee buyer future fixed fees coverage (up to 50% of fees of the service provided) (Similar principal to iTunes cards).
  • Power tokens emission is based on:

    Wattom open new nanohub typed facility (one of two types, mentioned above)

    Depending on the facility to be commissioned and equipment to be deployed the power future consumption calculations will take place, and bundle calculation formula is:
    PJ = E * Pw * 24 * 30 * 365 where:
    PJ - “power jar” or emission bundle of Power tokens
    E - number of equipment
    Pw - power consumption by each device in kW*h

Power and Slot tokens are pure utility tokens and can be traded freely on the open secondary market

Sole emitent of the Power and Slot tokens is Wattom and emission is backed by:

  • Slot tokens represents physical capacity (cell) in the corresponding nanohub and strictly bounded to the existing or planned facility
  • Power tokens represents available and provable free power capacity, that can be used in future for the fees coverage (when planned facility will be commissioned) (details of services inside power token unit will be written in detail)
collapse

Infrastructure

Our infrastructure is based on the network of geographically distributed nanohubs and each nanohub is small, self-sustainable, highly secured, almost autonomous and high-end equipped mobile facility able to host various kinds of user’s computational hardware.

Including: generic\common multi-processor units, specialized multi-chip\-processor units, AI-processor based units, photonic processor based units.

NANOHUBS LOCATIONS

Stavropol, Stavropol region, Russia

Kalinin NPP Tver Region, 380 km from MKAD

Kalinin NPP Tver Region, 380 km from MKAD

Kalinin NPP Tver Region, 380 km from MKAD
